body: Her being raped and lightly ryona is so cute and hot. Thank you udon-sensei for less guro in this one. For irl, sasuga japanese law is still a shit. Fuck retards, not their faults but I simply dont want them in my line of sight.

Alright i try not to be negative, I try not to hate on what others enjoy especially since I am after all a lolicon and am into frowned upon things myself but this is absolutely fucking disgusting.  this makes me wanna go back to high-school and shove every loud filthy retards head into a toilet until they're sick then kick the shit out of them till they cough up blood. @Udon don't break your rules for an exception. This is made to corrupt you. DON'T DEMORALIZE YOURSELF BECAUSE OF AN INJUSTICE.

...alright, first off, my sister is autistic, like, to a similar degree. Screaming, being unable to speak beyond vague approximations of singular words, being super physical with affections and whatnot. I don't... think this is a good portrayal of them... Even then, though, the mother and father of the fat fuck would be held accountable, and he'd likely be locked up in some home in the event of them being unable to properly care for and supervise him, no? If anything, their history of being unable to keep him in check would help bolster her case against the parents. Right?

Mentally handicapped people are still human, so the human rights law should still be applicable to them. A crime is a crime, even if they are not in the right mind they should still be judged for their crimes. The only retarded people here are those that passes law that excludes handicapped people from fair trial

Ahhh fuck that dude. I hate how you can't blame mentally challenge mfers. I experienced the good and bad of interacting with special kids. One is a friend from elementary, which is a retarded 6'1ft nigga, I look to that dude like a lil brother. Then there's the spoiled brats, those mfers. I'm just eating alone at mcdonalds then that retard came in shouting with his mom complaining bout a happy meal then that dude scratched my back so strong that it bled. I was about to snuff the fucker if not for the guard looking at us. Mom ask for forgiveness like the dad here on this doujin. So if you asked me what similarities I have with a girl is that a mentally disabled kid made us bleed lmaooo.
